Gridworld_demo package

Submodules

gridworld_demo.gridworld_dyna_dqn_demo module

CoBeLRL.demo.gridworld_demo.gridworld_dyna_dqn_demo.trialEndCallback(trial, rlAgent, logs)

This is a callback routine that is called when a single trial ends. Here, functionality for performance evaluation can be introduced.

Parameters

  • trial – The number of the finished trial.

  • rlAgent – The employed reinforcement learning agent.

  • logs – Output of the reinforcement learning subsystem.

Returns

None

CoBeLRL.demo.gridworld_demo.gridworld_dyna_dqn_demo.singleRun()

This method performs a single experimental run, i.e. one experiment. It has to be called by either a parallelization mechanism (without visual output), or by a direct call (in this case, visual output can be used).

Param

None

Returns

None

gridworld_demo.gridworld_dyna_q_demo module

CoBeLRL.demo.gridworld_demo.gridworld_dyna_q_demo.trialEndCallback(trial, rlAgent, logs)

This is a callback routine that is called when a single trial ends. Here, functionality for performance evaluation can be introduced.

Parameters

  • rlAgent – The employed reinforcement learning agent.

Returns

CoBeLRL.demo.gridworld_demo.gridworld_dyna_q_demo.singleRun()

This method performs a single experimental run, i.e. one experiment. It has to be called by either a parallelization mechanism (without visual output), or by a direct call (in this case, visual output can be used).

Param

None

Returns
